name: Strangers of the Power 2 - Pain Queen character
detailed_description:
Strangers of the Power 2 - Pain Queen Character


Prisca is a brand new character who was voted by the fans as the new character to be added.



Prisca is a queen who fights using a whip. She's selfish, arrogant and naughty. Prisca is fully voiced and comes with two costumes.

Features

  • Brand new fully voice acted character
  • Two outfits; Regular and naughty time
  • New achievement; F-5

short_description: Prisca is a queen who fights using a whip. She's selfish, arrogant and naughty. Prisca is fully voiced and comes with two costumes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: 1 GB Graphics card memory
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
